material_metadata.name: Primordial Crystal
material_metadata.narrative: Suspended in perpetual crystallization. Neither fully solid nor energy, exists in quantum superposition.

material_metadata.name: Voidstone
material_metadata.narrative: Pitch-black stone that seems to pull light into itself. Radiates subtle wrongness.

material_metadata.name: Etherion Ingot
material_metadata.narrative: Reality-bending metal that has transcended conventional physics. Durability frozen in time, effects can occur before cause.

material_metadata.name: Void Essence
material_metadata.narrative: Liquid darkness given physical form. Absorbs heat, light, and hope.

material_metadata.name: Spectral Thread
material_metadata.narrative: Ethereal substance from creatures between worlds. Exists partially out of phase.

material_metadata.name: Diamond
material_metadata.narrative: Perfect crystalline structure that refracts reality itself. Entire fortunes built on single specimens.

material_metadata.name: Void Essence

material_metadata.name: Adamantine Ingot
material_metadata.narrative: Nearly indestructible metal that can withstand forces that would shatter lesser materials. Each ingot represents months of careful refinement.

material_metadata.name: Ironwood Plank
material_metadata.narrative: Refined ironwood planks, nearly as strong as actual metal.
